document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Adventure </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">most </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">unto </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">itself </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Soul </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">condemned </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">Attended </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">single </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#809448">Hound </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">own </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffcc7c">identity </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: This consciousness that is aware
